'''Puff Pops''' is a food item that the player can [[cook]]. The [[recipe]] for Puff Pops is obtainable from Level 2 [[Reputation]] with [[Scions of the Canopy]].

Depending on the quality, Puff Pops heals the target [[Character]] for 1 HP every 8 seconds for '''32'''/'''40'''/'''48''' seconds, while briefly displaying the logo of the ''Scions of the Canopy''. This effect will only activate when the selected character is also the active character. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].
